system.description:
Developed by The Institute after the Great War, Institute lasers differ in design and function from the pre-War lasers used by other factions such as the Brotherhood of Steel. Eschewing raw power for a rapid succession of beams, these lasers can lay down a searing volley of suppressive fire.

The default profile is for an Institute laser pistol. An Institute laser can accept one each of the following mods. Any Stock mods change the weapon to an Institute laser rifle.

  • Capacitor: Photon Exciter, Beta Wave Tuner, Boosted Capacitor, Photon Agitator
  • Barrel: Long Barrel, Automatic Barrel, Improved Barrel
  • Stock: Standard Stock
  • Sights: Reflex Sight, Short Scope, Long Scope, Short Night Vision Scope, Long Night Vision Scope, Recon Scope
  • Muzzle: Beam Splitter, Beam Focuser, Gyro Compensating Lens
